name: Marble Race
description:
Race through colorful levels filled with obstacles and monsters and claim the best time. Challenge your friends in a 4-way battle arena. Unlock secrets and even build your own levels. A tribute to "Hamsterball" and "Marble Madness".

• CONQUER unique and charming levels
• AVOID enemies and traps
• CHALLENGE your friends in battle arena or co-op.
• SUPPORTS multitude of input devices such are gamepads, joysticks, etc.

Trailer Music by waterflame at newgrounds
Theme by k-pone at newgrounds

-----------------------------
If you wan't help building levels, join our discord server on community page.
